name: OneSpot, Inc.
description: Developer of a content marketing platform designed to personalize branded content across websites, email, paid media and more, The company's content marketing platform uses machine learning technology that automatically surfaces the most personally relevant content to the visitors across channels and continually improves content recommendations of the visitors to keep them coming back and reading more of the content. enabling brands to build strong content-based relationships, provide measurable audience and content insights and drive quantifiable results.
